metadata.title: CVE-2023-32723 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Request to LDAP is sent before user permissions are checked.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32723` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zabbix-agent - 4.0.20rc1
zabbix-frontend-php - 4.0.20rc1
zabbix-java-gateway - 4.0.20rc1
zabbix-proxy-mysql - 4.0.20rc1
zabbix-proxy-pgsql - 4.0.20rc1
zabbix-proxy-sqlite3 - 4.0.20rc1
zabbix-server-mysql - 4.0.20rc1
zabbix-server-pgsql - 4.0.20rc1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zabbix package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.20rc1').
